summary: Embarking on a journey to fulfill her dreams as a dancer, a young girl discovers a new style of dance that will prove to be the source of both conflict and self-discovery.
cast: Mary Elizabeth Winstead|Tessa Thompson|Riley Smith|John Reardon|Julissa Bermudez|Ashley Roberts|Karen LeBlanc|Matt Kippen|Erik Fjeldsted|Aaron Merke|Leigh Enns|Christina Grace|Debbie Patterson|Sofia Costantini|Jeremy Koz|Gordon Tanner|Kyle Nobess|Terry Ray|Alexandra Herzog|Michael Xavier|Sara Thompson|Tara Birtwhistle|Ernie Pitts|Dan Skene|Nigel Holt|Duncan Tran|Tyrell Witherspoon|Frederick Allen|Craig Harrison|Rylan Mayberry
title: Make It Happen
